body_html:
OK. I think the problem is that it doesn't find enough MKL libraries but the minimal set. Here is my debug output:

**** MKL_LIBRARIES: /home/yinghai/local/fbsource/fbcode/third-party2/IntelComposerXE/2017.0.098/gcc-4.9-glibc-2.20/e9936bf/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_rt.so

Let me see how to fix this.
